item.title: Bronze - Rune Scimitars (Dragon Model)
item.dc:creator: @Tablon Tablon
item.description:
@Tablon wrote:

I made these a while back and didn’t really know which section these go under. I saw somone else post a similar type of thing to this so i assume it’s under this section

Well anyway what I have done is recoloured the dragon scimitar model with the colours bronze - rune
I’ve named them Turbo Scimitars (T scims)
They do not overwrite the original models because I see that being unnesccary
You don’t have do download any models
Just add the following ints into class 8.java:

[code]if(i == 9803){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 5652;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 5652;
class8.anInt174 = 6033;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 350;
class8.anInt198 = 1020;
class8.anInt204 = 324;
class8.anInt169 = -2;
class8.anInt194 = 0;
class8.anInt165 = 6031;
class8.anInt200 = 6031;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Bronze T Scimitar”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A bronze turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 9804){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 33;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 33;
class8.anInt174 = 6033;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 350;
class8.anInt198 = 1020;
class8.anInt204 = 324;
class8.anInt169 = -2;
class8.anInt194 = 0;
class8.anInt165 = 6031;
class8.anInt200 = 6031;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Iron T Scimitar”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A bronze turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}

if(i == 9805){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 41;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 41;
class8.anInt174 = 6033;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 350;
class8.anInt198 = 1020;
class8.anInt204 = 324;
class8.anInt169 = -2;
class8.anInt194 = 0;
class8.anInt165 = 6031;
class8.anInt200 = 6031;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Steel T Scimitar”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A steel turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 9806){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 128;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 128;
class8.anInt174 = 6033;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 350;
class8.anInt198 = 1020;

class8.anInt169 = -2;

class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Black T Scimitar”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A black turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 9807){class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;class8.anIntArray160[0] = 43297;class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;class8.anIntArray160[1] = 43297;class8.anInt174 = 6033;class8.anInt181 = 980;class8.anInt190 = 350;class8.anInt198 = 1020;class8.anInt204 = 324;class8.anInt169 = -2;class8.anInt194 = 0;class8.anInt165 = 6031;class8.anInt200 = 6031;class8.anInt175 = -1;class8.anInt197 = -1;class8.aString170 = “Mithril T Scimitar”;class8.aByteArray178 = “A mithril turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 9808){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 21662;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;class8.anIntArray160[1] = 21662;
class8.anInt174 = 6033;
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 350;
class8.anInt198 = 1020;
class8.anInt204 = 324;
class8.anInt169 = -2;
class8.anInt194 = 0;
class8.anInt165 = 6031;
class8.anInt200 = 6031;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Adamant T Scimitar”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A adamant turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 9809){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 36133;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 935;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 36133;
class8.anInt174 = 6033;//Item Look
class8.anInt181 = 980;
class8.anInt190 = 350;
class8.anInt198 = 1020;
class8.anInt204 = 324;
class8.anInt169 = -2;
class8.anInt194 = 0;
class8.anInt165 = 6031;
class8.anInt200 = 6031;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Rune T Scimitar”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A rune turbo scimitar”.getBytes();
}[/code]

Then In you server files, go into config/item.cfg

add these to the bottom:

item = 9803 Bronze_T_scimitar A_vicious,Turbo, _curved_sword. 27.6582336721112 27.6582336721112 30.0253123688741 1 7 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 6 0 item = 9804 Iron_T_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 91.8337125141109 91.8337125141109 102.696680923095 2 10 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 9 0 item = 9805 Steel_T_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 310.874159853647 310.874159853647 358.292695008963 3 15 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 14 0 item = 9806 Black_T_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 1 1 979 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 item = 9807 Mithril_T_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 776.424041940835 776.424041940835 915.34476389961 5 21 -2 0 0 1 0 0 0 0 20 0 item = 9808 Adamant_T_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 1840.12163001218 1840.12163001218 2216.162107168 6 29 -2 0 0 1 0 0 0 0 28 0 item = 9809 Rune_T_scimitar A_vicious,_curved_sword. 16702.2105575155 16702.2105575155 21243.3495290539 7 45 -2 0 0 1 0 0 0 0 44 0

-Waves, Tablon
